movie.title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
movie.description_intro: In 1941, Italy allies with Germany and ruthlessly conquers the much weaker country of Greece. On a remote Greek island, an Italian artillery garrison is established to maintain order. One Italian officer, Captain Corelli, adopts an attitude of mutual co-existence with the Greeks and engages in such activities as music festivals and courting the daughter of a local doctor. In 1943, however, after Italy surrenders to the Allies and changes sides in the war, Captain Corelli must defend the Greek island against a German invasion.
movie.description_full: In 1941, Italy allies with Germany and ruthlessly conquers the much weaker country of Greece. On a remote Greek island, an Italian artillery garrison is established to maintain order. One Italian officer, Captain Corelli, adopts an attitude of mutual co-existence with the Greeks and engages in such activities as music festivals and courting the daughter of a local doctor. In 1943, however, after Italy surrenders to the Allies and changes sides in the war, Captain Corelli must defend the Greek island against a German invasion.

movies.title: A Small Town in Texas
movies.summary: After doing five years in prison on a drug charge, Poke is returns to his hometown intent on taking his sweetheart Mary Lee (and their child) away with him to California. His plan hits a snag, however, when he discovers that since his incarceration, Mary Lee has taken up with Duke, the very sheriff who put Poke behind bars in the first place. Things turn even worse for Poke when he later witnesses Duke assassinating a local Hispanic politician. Now with Duke out for his blood, Poke must choose to run for his life or make a stand.

movies.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions
movies.title_english: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions
movies.title_long: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions (2016)
movies.summary: Yugi and Kaiba have a special duel that transcends dimensions.
movies.description_full: Yugi and Kaiba have a special duel that transcends dimensions.
movies.synopsis: Yugi and Kaiba have a special duel that transcends dimensions.

movies.title: The Trip
movies.summary: When Steve Coogan is asked by The Observer to tour the country's finest restaurants, he envisions it as the perfect getaway with his beautiful girlfriend. But, when she backs out on him, he has no one to accompany him but his best friend and source of eternal aggravation, Rob Brydon.

But, when she backs out on him, he has no one to accompany him but his best friend and source of eternal aggravation, Rob Brydon.

movies.title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
movies.title_english: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
movies.title_long: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years (2016)
movies.summary: In the 1960s, the Beatles exploded on to the public scene, seemingly out of nowhere as the band's formative years of constant performing at home and in Hamburg, and Brian Epstein's grooming, finally paid off beyond their wildest dreams. Accompanying new interviews of the remaining Beatles, their associates and fans as well as archival interviews of the late ones, this film features footage of the heady concert years of 1963 to 66 when the band became a worldwide cultural phenomena topping them all. Furthermore, it also follows how the Fab Four began to change and grow while the excitement of Beatlemania began to sour their lives into an intolerable slog they needed to escape from to become more than what their fans wanted.
